column4: hi, I want to know whats a safe cpu temperature, mine shows "Thermal 1: ok, 90.0 degrees C"
that's quite hot
where did you get that number?
I do acpi -V
isnt it suposed to be 60 C ?
mine is 30ยบ... depends a lot on the cpu
90 is way too hot though
do you know any other command to check ?
I am using intel centrino duo, core 2 duo
on Lenovo thinkpad T60
cat /proc/acpi/thermal_zone/THRM/temperature
yes it shows 90C for both :(
are your legs on fire?
should I try cleaning up the cpu fan ?
I cleaned it up about a month ago
your cpu should never run that hot, it's designed to shut down at 70-80ยบ
ok
what do you suggest sp_ ?
but of course, if the fan is acting up, and you're experiencing related issues, cleaning it is a good idea
is it a laptop?
yes!
if you can touch the bottom without getting burned, I think it's safe to assume it's not really 90ยบ
